Millionaire Club

Millionaire Club

A closed club of Asian entrepreneurs united to develop themselves, their business and society

What does a club membership

Privileges from premium companies

Discounts and bonuses in the luxury-segment from partners. Club card is an automatic entrance to some closed societies of entrepreneurs.

Building International Relations

Exchange of International Partners. Acquaintance with the club's speakers and members operating outside of Asia. Foreign forums within the club.

Access to world-class speakers

Mentors of our club are world famous entrepreneurs, heads of major companies, world champions and star experts.

Promotion of personal brand

Access to the resident base of the club, as well as promoting you and your business on our media channels.

Strong environment

Only successful, motivated people with whom you grow up during the year. We bring together entrepreneurs from all over the world, we make friends with families, we grow together and we relax together.

  • Events
  • 1. Business breakfast
  • 2. Meetings with mentors
  • 3. Club events
  • 4. Networking parties with stars
  • 5. Master Mind Session
  • 6. Secret events

The main asset…

…and center of the universe is a talented, creative person. Creating an ecosystem that will allow such people to develop will be key. That's what we do

Creating an ecosystem that will allow such people to develop will be key. That's what we do.

Roger Lee, Club founder

Most of
our residents
are from Singapore

They are owners and co-owners of businesses from a variety of industries: IT, construction, sports, law, wholesale and retail, healthcare and others.

A candidate for club residency must meet the following criteria

$10KK
minimum annual turnover
3 years
minimal business experience with employees in the company

Club mentors

Meetings with mentors Large scale events, usually designed for the whole day. They take place in different formats, for example, business lectures or trips.

Eveline Isaac

Trader, Author and Trainer

Karena Wes

Forex Trainer of PAM Empire, Market Analyst

Evonne Conrad

eToro's current Business Development Associate for the Malaysia

Linette Brynn

Certified Blockchain Expert (USA), Leadership Coach, NLP Coach

Ryann Marnie

Forex Trader

The environment
opens up
new possibilities
Evonne Conrad
Airbnb Senior Vice President for Global Policy and Communications
In the investment block of the Club I started investing in IPO, so I was able to free up my time and invest in a dozen foreign companies without creating infrastructure. I earn more than if I invested this money in 1 existing business.
Gabriel Lee
Vice President of Community Support

Private events

Millionaire Club Music brings us together during times of uncertainty.
Millionaire Club Music brings joy and is a vehicle to light up our home.
Millionaire Club Music brings communities together to help one another in times of need.

Private social network

A base of trusted contractors

Residents openly share contacts with trusted contractors and suppliers, this information is also available on a closed social network for all members of our club.

Residence base

We have gathered all resident contacts, interests, business description and competencies so that you can quickly find useful contacts, contacts and competencies.

Request for help

We have created an opportunity for active networking and experience sharing so that you can get answers to personal and business questions.

Events

You can always find information and announcements of all club events. As well as videos of past meetings and other useful materials.

Closed groups

Common chat rooms for all residents and chat rooms of interest, which include confidential chat rooms for current mentors, interviewers of resident candidates, referral chats and board members.

Club House
The Club House is opened in the center of Singapore. They're always waiting for you here. Here you can always meet your colleagues, socialize or work in silence.
In the Club House there is a place for every resident to discuss business issues, attend a private event or share personal questions with the board.
209 Jln Loyang Besar, Singapore 509489

Cost of annual membership

Online membership

$1,000 paid once
  • Access to business chat general;
  • Access to the Knowledge Base Chat;
  • Possibility to participate in retreats;
  • Educational content;
  • Chat moderation;
  • Access to businessmen's contact database online
  • Access to the contact database of the club network entrepreneurs.
Every month:
  • The Mindset Online Event;
  • An open meeting online;
  • The meeting with the speaker is broadcast.

Standart membership

$2,000 paid once
  • Access to the Entrepreneurs' Chat;
  • Access to the Knowledge Base Chat;
  • Discounts from partners;
  • Mentor Group;
  • Searching for a point of business growth from mentors;
  • Ability to bring an employee or family member to the event;
  • Access to club netting base.
Every month:
  • The Mindset Event;
  • An informal event;
  • The meeting with the speaker.

VIP membership

$5,000 paid once
  • Access to the Entrepreneurs' Chat;
  • Access to the Knowledge Base Chat;
  • Discounts from partners;
  • Mentor Group;
  • Searching for a point of business growth from mentors;
  • Ability to bring an employee or family member to the event;
  • The right to enter the presidium of the club;
  • Right to use Club logo;;
  • The right to address the problem to the administration of the club;
  • Access to contact database in other cities;
  • Integration into Finexpo social networks;
Every month:
  • The Mindset Event;
  • An informal event;
  • The meeting with the speaker.

Joining the Сlub

The 5-step test allows for comfortable communication among equals while maintaining complete confidentiality and lack of competition. Minimum turnover for your company to enter: for owners — $10KK per year; for top managers – $50KK per year

  • 1
    Filling in the form
  • 2
    Personal interview
  • 3
    Security check
  • 4
    First meeting and assessment
  • 5
    Joining the Club
